methods.name: OperationStatus
methods.doc:
This property indicates the ON/OFF status.

ON＝0x30，OFF＝0x31

Data Type : unsigned char
Data Size(Byte) : 1

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : optional
Get : mandatory

Announcement at status change

methods.name: InstallationLocation
methods.doc:
This property indicates the installation location

See “2.2 ‘Installation location’ property.”

Data Type : unsigned char
Data Size(Byte) : 1

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : mandatory
Get : mandatory

Announcement at status change

methods.name: StandardVersionInformation
methods.doc:
This property indicates the version number of the corresponding standard.

First byte: Fixed at 0x00 (for future reserved).
Second byte: Fixed at 0x00 (for future reserved).
Third byte: Indicates the order of release in the ASCII format.
Fourth byte: Fixed at 0x00 (for future reserved).

Data Type : unsigned char×4
Data Size(Byte) : 4

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : undefined
Get : mandatory

methods.name: IdentificationNumber
methods.doc:
A number that allows each object to be uniquely identified.

First byte: lower-layer communication ID field
0x01－0xFD：This is a communication protocol used in the lower-layer communication and is set arbitrarily according to the protocol class in the case where unique number is assigned (not used in ECHONET Lite).
0x11－0x1F: Power line Communication Protocol A and B systems
0x31-0x3F: Designated low-powor radio
0x41-0x4F: Extended HBS
0x51-0x5F: IrDA
0x61-0x6F: LonTalk®
0x71-0x7F: BlueTooth
0x81-0x8F: Ethernet
0x91-0x9F: IEEE802.11/11B
0xA1: Power line Communication Protocol C systems
0xB2：IPv6/6LoWPAN
0xFE：2－17 bytes are defined by the manufacturer, and are set according to the type.
0xFF：2－9 bytes are defined when randomly generated protocol is used in the lower-layer communication.
0x00：Identification number is not set.
Second and succeeding bytes: unique number field

Data Type : unsigned char
Data Size(Byte) : 9 or 17

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : undefined
Get : optional

methods.name: MeasuredInstantaneousPowerConsumption
methods.doc:
This property indicates the instantaneous power consumption of the device in watts.

0x0000-0xFFFF（0-65535W）

Data Type : unsigned short
Data Size(Byte) : 2

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : undefined
Get : optional

methods.name: MeasuredCumulativePowerConsumption
methods.doc:
This property indicates the cumulative power consumption of the device in increments of 0.001kWh.

0x0-0x3B9AC9FF（0-999,999.999kWh）

Data Type : unsigned long
Data Size(Byte) : 4

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : undefined
Get : optional

methods.name: ManufacturersFaultCode
methods.doc:
This property indicates the manufacturer-defined fault code.

First byte: Indicates the data size of the fault code field.
Second to fourth bytes: Manufacturer code
Fifth and succeeding bytes: Field for manufacturer-defined fault code

Data Type : unsigned char×(MAX)225
Data Size(Byte) : Max 225

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : undefined
Get : optional

methods.name: CurrentLimitSetting
methods.doc:
This property indicates the current limit setting (0-100%).
0x00-0x64 （=0-100%）

Data Type : unsigned char
Data Size(Byte) : 1

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : optional
Get : optional

methods.name: FaultStatus
methods.doc:
This property indicates whether a fault (e.g. a sensor trouble) has occurred or not.

Fault occurred＝0x41, No fault has occurred＝0x42

Data Type : unsigned char
Data Size(Byte) : 1

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : undefined
Get : mandatory

Announcement at status change

methods.name: FaultDescription
methods.doc:
Describes the fault.

See “2.5 ‘Fault Description’ Property.”

Data Type : unsigned short
Data Size(Byte) : 2

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : undefined
Get : optional

methods.name: ManufacturerCode
methods.doc:
3-byte manufacturer code

(Defined by the ECHONET Consortium.)

Data Type : unsigned char×3
Data Size(Byte) : 3

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : undefined
Get : mandatory

methods.name: ￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼BusinessFacilityCode

（Defined by each manufacturer.）

Identifies the product usingASCI I code.
（Defined by each manufacturer.）

Data Type : unsigned char×12
Data Size(Byte) : 12

AccessRule
Announce : undefined

Get : optional

methods.name: ProductionNumber
methods.doc:
This property indicates the production number using ASCI I code.

（Defined by each manufacturer.）

Data Type : unsigned char×12
Data Size(Byte) : 12

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : undefined
Get : optional

methods.name: ProductionDate
methods.doc:
4-byte production date code

This property indicates the product ion date in the YYMD format (1 character = 1 byte) .
YY： Year (e.g. 1999＝ 0x07CF)
M： Month (e.g. December＝0x0C)
D： Day (e.g. 20th＝ 0x14)

Data Type : unsigned char×4
Data Size(Byte) : 4

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : undefined
Get : optional

methods.name: PowerSavingOperationSetting
methods.doc:
This property indicates whether the device is operating in power-saving mode.

Operating in power-saving mode =0x41
Operating in normal operation mode =0x42

Data Type : unsigned char
Data Size(Byte) : 1

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : optional
Get : optional

methods.name: PositionInformation
methods.doc:
This property indicates the latitude, longitude and altitude of the installation location.

Data Type : unsigned char×16
Data Size(Byte) : 16

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : optional
Get : optional

Announcement at status change

methods.doc:
Current time (HH：MM format)

0x00-0x17：0x00-0x3B（ ＝ 0-23）：（ ＝ 0-59）

Data Size(Byte) : 2

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : optional
Get : optional

methods.name: CurrentDateSetting
methods.doc:
Current date (YYYY：MM：DD format)

1 ～ 0x270F ： 1 ～ 0x0C ： 1 ～ 0x1F (=1 ～ 9999) ： (=1 ～ 12) ： (=1 ～ 31)

Data Type : unsigned char×4
Data Size(Byte) : 4

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : optional
Get : optional

methods.name: PowerLimitSetting
methods.doc:
This property indicates the power limit setting in watts.

0x0000~0xFFFF（0-65535W）

Data Type : unsigned short
Data Size(Byte) : 2

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : optional
Get : optional

methods.name: CumulativeOperatingTime
methods.doc:
This property indicates the cumulative number of days, hours, minutes or seconds for which the device has operated, using 1 byte for the unit and 4 bytes for the time.

First byte: Indicates the unit.
Second： 0x41; Minute： 0x42; Hour： 0x43; Day:0x44
Second to fifth bytes ：
Indicates the elapsed time in the unit specified by the first byte. 0x00000000-0xFFFFFFFF (0-4294967295)

Data Type : unsigned char + unsigned long
Data Size(Byte) : 1+4 Byte

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : undefined
Get : optional

methods.name: OperationSetting
methods.doc:
Used to set the operation mode (ventilation mode, bathroom pre-warmer mode, bathroom heater mode, bathroom dryer mode, cool air circulator mode or �gstop�h), and to acquire the current setting.

Ventilation operation : 0x10 Bathroom pre-warmer operation : 0x20 Bathroom heater operation : 0x30 Bathroom dryer operation : 0x40 Cool air circulator operation : 0x50 Stop :0x00

Name : Operation setting
EPC : 0xB0
Data Type : unsigned char
Data Size(Byte) : 1 byte

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : mandatory
Get : mandatory

methods.name: VentilationOperationSetting
methods.doc:
Used to set the ventilation air flow rate level for the ventilation mode and to acquire the current setting.

Automatic : 0x41 Standard : 0x42 Air flow rate level : 0x31 to 0x38

Name : Ventilation operation setting
EPC : 0xB1
Data Type : unsigned char
Data Size(Byte) : 1 bytes

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : optional
Get : optional

methods.name: BathroomPreWarmerOperationSetting
methods.doc:

Automatic : 0x41 Standard : 0x42 Bathroom pre-warming level : 0x31 to 0x38

Name : Bathroom pre-warmer operation setting
EPC : 0xB2

AccessRule
Announce : undefined

methods.doc:
Used to set the ON/OFF status of the ON timer-based reservation function and to acquire the current setting.

Reservation function ON: 0x41 Reservation function OFF: 0x42

Data Size(Byte) : 1 bytes

Set : optional
Get : optional

methods.name: GonTimerBasedReservationHSetting2
methods.doc:
Used to set the ON/OFF status of the ON timer-based reservation function with the mode in which the device starts operating specified, and to acquire the current setting.

Reservation function ON for the ventilation mode : 0x10 Reservation function ON for the bathroom pre-warmer mode : 0x20 Reservation function ON for the bathroom heater mode : 0x30 Reservation function ON for the bathroom dryer mode : 0x40 Reservation function ON for the cool air circulator mode : 0x50 Reservation function OFF : 0x00

Name : �gON timer-based reservation�h setting 2
EPC : 0xE1
Data Type : unsigned char
Data Size(Byte) : 1 bytes

AccessRule
Announce : undefined
Set : optional
Get : optional

0 to 0x17: 0 to 0x3B (= 0 to 23): (= 0 to 59)

Get : optional
